title: 服务器后台刷屏
author: 末泽
txt_content:
服务器后台老是刷屏
一直刷这段
java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: org.bukkit.Bukkit.getOnlinePlayers()Ljava/util/Collection;
        at me.minebuilders.clearlag.Util.broadcast(Util.java:42) ~[?:?]
        at me.minebuilders.clearlag.tasks.ClearTask.run(ClearTask.java:47) ~[?:?]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R1.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:58) ~[CraftTask.class:git-Cauldron-MCPC-Plus-1.7.2-1.1147.04.163]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R1.scheduler.CraftScheduler.mainThreadHeartbeat(CraftScheduler.java:345) [CraftScheduler.class:git-Cauldron-MCPC-Plus-1.7.2-1.1147.04.163]
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:840) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71190_q(DedicatedServer.java:432) [lj.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:780) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:643) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.7.0_17]
[09:42:57] [Server thread/WARN]: [ClearLag] Task #20 for ClearLag v2.8.2 generated an exception

谁知道是什么问题，是哪个插件问题，还是MOD问题

replies.author: 末泽
replies.txt_content:
sfter 发表于 2015-8-24 10:37
clearlag的问题
谢谢，一开始我就知道了，现在我换了一个清道夫插件，虽然没什么帮助，但是也谢谢，给第一
